full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DBYANGS LNGA'I BYABS KHRUS 'BYUNG LNGA'I DUG SEL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I GSUNGS LAS SNYIGS MUS MI RNAM LA 'DOD CHAGS ZHE LDANG, GTI SUG SER SNA NGA RGYAL SOGS RAB CHE BA 'BAR GYIS STENG BAR BOG GSUM SNA GA-YO DANG, NAD NAS 'BYUNG LNGA 'KHRUGS PA YAS @017B RLUNG MA KHRIS PAR KAN 'DUS SOGS RGYAL LA SNA TSOGS 'JIGS PA 'BYUNG BA DANG, MA SHES NAD GYUR BA DANG, SNYING RLUNG SMYO 'KHRUG SKYUGS 'GUL 'GAGS RMA SNA PHUNG PO'I SGRIB DANG, 'BYUNG LNGA DUG BSAL BA'I MCHOG NI YE SHES LNGA'I 'JAM DPAL 'DI NI THE TSOM ZHES 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO LDAN DGE SLONG DON GRUB BZANG PA'O,, ,,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE,
